   20: -module(re_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2, pcre/1,compile_options/1,
   24:          pcre2_incompat/1,
   25: 	 run_options/1,combined_options/1,replace_autogen/1,
   26: 	 global_capture/1,replace_input_types/1,replace_with_fun/1,replace_return/1,
   27: 	 split_autogen/1,split_options/1,split_specials/1,
   28: 	 error_handling/1,pcre_cve_2008_2371/1,re_version/1,
   29: 	 pcre_compile_workspace_overflow/1,re_infinite_loop/1, 
   30: 	 re_backwards_accented/1,opt_dupnames/1,opt_all_names/1,inspect/1,
   31: 	 opt_no_start_optimize/1,opt_never_utf/1,opt_ucp/1,
   32: 	 match_limit/1,sub_binaries/1,copt/1,global_unicode_validation/1,
   33:          yield_on_subject_validation/1, bad_utf8_subject/1,
   34:          error_info/1]).
   35: 
   36: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   37: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   38: 
   39: suite() ->
   40:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   41:      {timetrap,{minutes,3}}].
   42: 
   43: all() -> 
   44:     [pcre, compile_options, run_options, combined_options,
   45:      pcre2_incompat,
   46:      replace_autogen, global_capture, replace_input_types,
   47:      replace_with_fun, replace_return, split_autogen, split_options,
   48:      split_specials, error_handling, pcre_cve_2008_2371,
   49:      pcre_compile_workspace_overflow, re_infinite_loop, 
   50:      re_backwards_accented, opt_dupnames, opt_all_names, 
   51:      inspect, opt_no_start_optimize,opt_never_utf,opt_ucp,
   52:      match_limit, sub_binaries, re_version, global_unicode_validation,
   53:      yield_on_subject_validation, bad_utf8_subject,
   54:      error_info].
   55: 
   56: groups() -> 
   57:     [].
   58: 
   59: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   60:     Config.
   61: 
   62: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   63:     ok.
   64: 
   65: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   66:     Config.
   67: 
   68: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   69:     Config.
   70: 
   71: 
   72: %% Run all applicable tests from the PCRE testsuites.
   73: pcre(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   74:     RootDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   75:     Res = run_pcre_tests:test(RootDir),
   76:     0 = lists:sum([ X || {X,_,_} <- Res ]),
   77:     {comment,Res}.
   78: 
   79: %% Test all documented compile options.
   80: compile_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   81:     ok = ctest("ABDabcdABCD","abcd",[],true,{match,[{3,4}]}),
   82:     ok = ctest("ABDabcdABCD","abcd",[anchored],true,nomatch),
   83:     ok = ctest("ABDabcdABCD",".*abcd",[anchored],true,{match,[{0,7}]}),
   84:     ok = ctest("ABCabcdABC","ABCD",[],true,nomatch),
   85:     ok = ctest("ABCabcdABC","ABCD",[caseless],true,{match,[{3,4}]}),
   86:     ok = ctest("abcdABC\n","ABC$",[],true,{match,[{4,3}]}),
   87:     ok = ctest("abcdABC\n","ABC$",[dollar_endonly],true,nomatch),
   88:     ok = ctest("abcdABC\n","ABC.",[],true,nomatch),
   89:     ok = ctest("abcdABC\n","ABC.",[dotall],true,{match,[{4,4}]}),
   90:     ok = ctest("abcdABCD","ABC .",[],true,nomatch),
   91:     ok = ctest("abcdABCD","ABC .",[extended],true,{match,[{4,4}]}),
   92:     ok = ctest("abcd\nABCD","ABC",[],true,{match,[{5,3}]}),
   93:     ok = ctest("abcd\nABCD","ABC",[firstline],true,nomatch),
   94:     ok = ctest("abcd\nABCD","^ABC",[],true,nomatch),
   95:     ok = ctest("abcd\nABCD","^ABC",[multiline],true,{match,[{5,3}]}),
   96:     ok = ctest("abcdABCD","(ABC)",[],true,{match,[{4,3},{4,3}]}),
   97:     ok = ctest("abcdABCD","(ABC)",[no_auto_capture],true,{match,[{4,3}]}),
   98:     ok = ctest(notused,"(?<FOO>ABC)|(?<FOO>DEF)",[],false,notused),
   99:     ok = ctest("abcdABCD","(?<FOO>ABC)|(?<FOO>DEF)",[dupnames],true,{match,[{4,3},{4,3}]}),
  100:     ok = ctest("abcdABCDabcABCD","abcd.*D",[],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  101:     ok = ctest("abcdABCDabcABCD","abcd.*D",[ungreedy],true,{match,[{0,8}]}),
  102:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcABC\nD","abcd.*D",[],true,nomatch),
  103:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcABC\nD","abcd.*D",[{newline,cr}],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  104:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcABC\rD","abcd.*D",[],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  105:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcABC\rD","abcd.*D",[{newline,lf}],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  106:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,lf}],true,nomatch),
  107:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,cr}],true,nomatch),
  108:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  109: 
  110:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\r","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}],true,nomatch),
  111:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\n","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}],true,nomatch),
  112:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  113: 
  114:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\r","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  115:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcd\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  116:     ok.
  117: 
  118: %% Test all documented run specific options.
  119: run_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  120:     rtest("ABCabcdABC","abc",[],[], match),
  121:     rtest("ABCabcdABC","abc",[anchored],[], nomatch),
  122:     %% Anchored in run overrides unanchored in compilation
  123:     rtest("ABCabcdABC","abc",[],[anchored], nomatch),
  124: 
  125:     rtest("","a?b?",[],[], match),
  126:     rtest("","a?b?",[],[notempty], nomatch),
  127: 
  128:     rtest("abc","^a",[],[], match),
  129:     rtest("abc","^a",[],[notbol], nomatch),
  130:     rtest("ab\nc","^a",[multiline],[], match),
  131:     rtest("ab\nc","^a",[multiline],[notbol], nomatch),
  132:     rtest("ab\nc","^c",[multiline],[notbol], match),
  133: 
  134:     rtest("abc","c$",[],[], match),
  135:     rtest("abc","c$",[],[noteol], nomatch),
  136: 
  137:     rtest("ab\nc","b$",[multiline],[], match),
  138:     rtest("ab\nc","c$",[multiline],[], match),
  139:     rtest("ab\nc","b$",[multiline],[noteol], match),
  140:     rtest("ab\nc","c$",[multiline],[noteol], nomatch),
  141: 
  142:     rtest("abc","ab",[],[{offset,0}], match),
  143:     rtest("abc","ab",[],[{offset,1}], nomatch),
  144: 
  145:     rtest("abcdABCabcABC\nD","abcd.*D",[],[], nomatch),
  146:     rtest("abcdABCabcABC\rD","abcd.*D",[],[], match),
  147:     rtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[],[{newline,lf}], nomatch),
  148: 
  149:     {ok,MP} = re:compile(".*(abcd).*"),
  150:     {match,[{0,10},{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[]),
  151:     {match,[{0,10},{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all}]),
  152:     {match,[{0,10},{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all,index}]),
  153:     {match,["ABCabcdABC","abcd"]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all,list}]),
  154:     {match,[<<"ABCabcdABC">>,<<"abcd">>]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all,binary}]),
  155:     {match,[{0,10}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,first}]),
  156:     {match,[{0,10}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,first,index}]),       {match,["ABCabcdABC"]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,first,list}]),
  157:     {match,[<<"ABCabcdABC">>]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,first,binary}]),
  158: 
  159:     {match,[{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all_but_first}]),
  160:     {match,[{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all_but_first,index}]),
  161:     {match,["abcd"]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all_but_first,list}]),
  162:     {match,[<<"abcd">>]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,all_but_first,binary}]),
  163: 
  164:     match = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,none}]),
  165:     match = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,none,index}]),
  166:     match = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,none,list}]),
  167:     match = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP,[{capture,none,binary}]),
  168: 
  169:     {ok,MP2} = re:compile(".*(?<FOO>abcd).*"),
  170:     {match,[{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,[1]}]),
  171:     {match,[{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,['FOO']}]),
  172:     {match,[{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,["FOO"]}]),
  173:     {match,["abcd"]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,["FOO"],list}]),
  174:     {match,[<<"abcd">>]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,["FOO"],binary}]),
  175: 
  176:     {match,[{-1,0}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,[200]}]),
  177:     {match,[{-1,0}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,['BAR']}]),
  178:     {match,[""]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,[200],list}]),
  179:     {match,[""]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,['BAR'],list}]),
  180:     {match,[<<>>]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,[200],binary}]),
  181:     {match,[<<>>]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP2,[{capture,['BAR'],binary}]),
  182: 
  183:     {ok, MP3} = re:compile(".*((?<FOO>abdd)|a(..d)).*"),
  184:     {match,[{0,10},{3,4},{-1,0},{4,3}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP3,[]),
  185:     {match,[{0,10},{3,4},{-1,0},{4,3}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP3,[{capture,all,index}]),
  186:     {match,[<<"ABCabcdABC">>,<<"abcd">>,<<>>,<<"bcd">>]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP3,[{capture,all,binary}]),
  187:     {match,["ABCabcdABC","abcd",[],"bcd"]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",MP3,[{capture,all,list}]),
  188:     ok.
  189: 
  190: 
  191: pcre2_incompat(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  192:     %% Not allowed to pass changed newline option to re:run/3
  193:     rtest("abcdABCabcABC\nD", "abcd.*D", [], [{newline,cr}],  badarg),
  194:     rtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n", "abcd$", [], [{newline,crlf}],  badarg),
  195:     rtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n", "abcd$", [], [{newline,anycrlf}],  badarg),
  196:     rtest("abcdABCabcd\r", "abcd$", [], [{newline,any}],  badarg),
  197: 
  198:     [rtest("abcdABCabcd\r", "abcd$", [{newline,C}], [{newline,R}],  badarg)
  199:      || C <- [lf, cr, crlf, anycrlf, any],
  200:         R <- [lf, cr, crlf, anycrlf, any],
  201:         C =/= R],
  202: 
  203:     %% But we do allowed to pass an unchanged newline option to re:run/3
  204:     rtest("abcdABCabcABC\rD", "abcd.*D", [], [{newline,lf}],  match),
  205: 
  206:     [rtest("abcABC", "abc", [{newline,NL}], [{newline,NL}],  match)
  207:      || NL <- [lf, cr, crlf, anycrlf, any]],
  208: 
  209:     %% Not allowed to pass changed BSR option to re:run/3
  210:     rtest("abcdABCabcABC\nD", "abcd.*D", [], [bsr_anycrlf],  badarg),
  211:     rtest("abcdABCabcd\r", "abcd$", [bsr_unicode], [bsr_anycrlf], badarg),
  212:     rtest("abcdABCabcd\r", "abcd$", [bsr_anycrlf], [bsr_unicode], badarg),
  213: 
  214:     %% But we do allowed an unchanged BSR option to re:run/3
  215:     rtest("abcd\x{85}D", "abcd\\RD", [], [bsr_unicode],  match),
  216:     rtest("abcd\x{85}D", "abcd\\RD", [bsr_unicode], [bsr_unicode],  match),
  217:     rtest("abcd\r\nD", "abcd\\RD", [bsr_anycrlf], [bsr_anycrlf],  match),
  218:     ok.
  219: 
  220: %% Test the version is returned correctly
  221: re_version(_Config) ->
  222:     Version = re:version(),
  223:     {match,[Version]} = re:run(Version,
  224:                                ~B"^\d{2}\.\d{2} 20\d{2}-\d{2}-\d{2}",
  225:                                [{capture,all,binary}]),
  226:     ok.
  227: 
  228: global_unicode_validation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  229:     %% Test that unicode validation of the subject is not done
  230:     %% for every match found...
  231:     Bin = binary:copy(<<"abc\n">>,100000),
  232:     {TimeAscii, _} = take_time(fun () ->
  233:                                        re:run(Bin, <<"b">>, [global])
  234:                                end),
  235:     {TimeUnicode, _} = take_time(fun () ->
  236:                                          re:run(Bin, <<"b">>, [unicode,global])
  237:                                  end),
  238:     if TimeAscii == 0; TimeUnicode == 0 ->
  239:             {comment, "Not good enough resolution to compare results"};
  240:        true ->
  241:             %% The time the operations takes should be in the
  242:             %% same order of magnitude. If validation of the
  243:             %% whole subject occurs for every match, the unicode
  244:             %% variant will take way longer time...
  245:             true = TimeUnicode div TimeAscii < 10
  246:     end.
  247: 
  248: take_time(Fun) ->
  249:     Start = erlang:monotonic_time(nanosecond),
  250:     Res = Fun(),
  251:     End = erlang:monotonic_time(nanosecond),
  252:     {End-Start, Res}.
  253: 
  254: yield_on_subject_validation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  255:     Go = make_ref(),
  256:     Bin = binary:copy(<<"abc\n">>,100000),
  257:     {P, M} = spawn_opt(fun () ->
  258:                                receive Go -> ok end,
  259:                                {match,[{1,1}]} = re:run(Bin, <<"b">>, [unicode])
  260:                        end,
  261:                        [link, monitor]),
  262:     1 = erlang:trace(P, true, [running]),
  263:     P ! Go,
  264:     N = count_re_run_trap_out(P, M),
  265:     true = N >= 5,
  266:     ok.
  267: 
  268: count_re_run_trap_out(P, M) when is_reference(M) ->
  269:     receive {'DOWN',M,process,P,normal} -> ok end,
  270:     TD = erlang:trace_delivered(P),
  271:     receive {trace_delivered, P, TD} -> ok end,
  272:     count_re_run_trap_out(P, 0);
  273: count_re_run_trap_out(P, N) when is_integer(N) ->
  274:     receive
  275:         {trace,P,out,{erlang,re_run_trap,3}} ->
  276:             count_re_run_trap_out(P, N+1)
  277:     after 0 ->
  278:             N
  279:     end.
  280: 
  281: %% Test compile options given directly to run.
  282: combined_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  283:     ok = crtest("ABDabcdABCD","abcd",[],true,{match,[{3,4}]}),
  284:     ok = crtest("ABDabcdABCD","abcd",[anchored],true,nomatch),
  285:     ok = crtest("ABDabcdABCD",".*abcd",[anchored],true,{match,[{0,7}]}),
  286:     ok = crtest("ABCabcdABC","ABCD",[],true,nomatch),
  287:     ok = crtest("ABCabcdABC","ABCD",[caseless],true,{match,[{3,4}]}),
  288:     ok = crtest("abcdABC\n","ABC$",[],true,{match,[{4,3}]}),
  289:     ok = crtest("abcdABC\n","ABC$",[dollar_endonly],true,nomatch),
  290:     ok = crtest("abcdABC\n","ABC.",[],true,nomatch),
  291:     ok = crtest("abcdABC\n","ABC.",[dotall],true,{match,[{4,4}]}),
  292:     ok = crtest("abcdABCD","ABC .",[],true,nomatch),
  293:     ok = crtest("abcdABCD","ABC .",[extended],true,{match,[{4,4}]}),
  294:     ok = crtest("abcd\nABCD","ABC",[],true,{match,[{5,3}]}),
  295:     ok = crtest("abcd\nABCD","ABC",[firstline],true,nomatch),
  296:     ok = crtest("abcd\nABCD","^ABC",[],true,nomatch),
  297:     ok = crtest("abcd\nABCD","^ABC",[multiline],true,{match,[{5,3}]}),
  298:     ok = crtest("abcdABCD","(ABC)",[],true,{match,[{4,3},{4,3}]}),
  299:     ok = crtest("abcdABCD","(ABC)",[no_auto_capture],true,{match,[{4,3}]}),
  300:     ok = crtest(notused,"(?<FOO>ABC)|(?<FOO>DEF)",[],false,notused),
  301:     ok = crtest("abcdABCD","(?<FOO>ABC)|(?<FOO>DEF)",[dupnames],true,{match,[{4,3},{4,3}]}),
  302:     ok = crtest("abcdABCDabcABCD","abcd.*D",[],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  303:     ok = crtest("abcdABCDabcABCD","abcd.*D",[ungreedy],true,{match,[{0,8}]}),
  304:     ok = ctest("abcdABCabcABC\nD","abcd.*D",[],true,nomatch),
  305:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcABC\nD","abcd.*D",[{newline,cr}],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  306:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcABC\rD","abcd.*D",[],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  307:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcABC\rD","abcd.*D",[{newline,lf}],true,{match,[{0,15}]}),
  308:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,lf}],true,nomatch),
  309:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,cr}],true,nomatch),
  310:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  311: 
  312:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}],true,nomatch),
  313:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\n","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}],true,nomatch),
  314:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  315: 
  316:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  317:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf}],true,{match,[{7,4}]}),
  318: 
  319:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{capture,all,list}],true,{match,["abcd"]}),
  320: 
  321:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{capture,all,list}],true,{match,["abcd"]}),
  322: 
  323:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{capture,all,list}],true,{match,["abcd"]}),
  324: 
  325:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{capture,all,binary}],true,{match,[<<"abcd">>]}),
  326: 
  327:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\r","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{capture,all,binary}],true,{match,[<<"abcd">>]}),
  328:     ok = crtest("abcdABCabcd\n","abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{capture,all,binary}],true,{match,[<<"abcd">>]}),
  329: 
  330:     %% Check that unique run-options fail in compile only case:
  331:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:compile("abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{capture,all,binary}])),
  332:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:compile("abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},{offset,3}])),
  333:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:compile("abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},notempty])),
  334:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:compile("abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},notbol])),
  335:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:compile("abcd$",[{newline,anycrlf},noteol])),
  336: 
  337: 
  338:     {match,_} = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\n","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}]),
  339:     nomatch = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\nefgh","abcd$",[{newline,crlf}]),
  340:     {match,_} = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\nefgh","abcd$",[{newline,crlf},multiline]),
  341:     nomatch = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\nefgh","efgh$",[{newline,crlf},multiline,noteol]),
  342:     {match,_} = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\nefgh","abcd$",[{newline,crlf},multiline,noteol]),
  343:     {match,_} = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\nefgh","^abcd",[{newline,crlf},multiline,noteol]),
  344:     nomatch = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\nefgh","^abcd",[{newline,crlf},multiline,notbol]),
  345:     {match,_} = re:run("abcdABCabcd\r\nefgh","^efgh",[{newline,crlf},multiline,notbol]),
  346:     {match,_} = re:run("ABC\nD","[a-z]*",[{newline,crlf}]),
  347:     nomatch = re:run("ABC\nD","[a-z]*",[{newline,crlf},notempty]),
  348:     ok.
  349: 
  350: %% Test replace with autogenerated erlang module.
  351: replace_autogen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  352:     re_testoutput1_replacement_test:run(),
  353:     ok.
  354: 
  355: %% Test capture options together with global searching.
  356: global_capture(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  357:     {match,[{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",".*(?<FOO>abcd).*",[{capture,[1]}]),
  358:     {match,[{10,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA",".*(?<FOO>abcd).*",[{capture,[1]}]),
  359:     {match,[[{10,4}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA",".*(?<FOO>abcd).*",[global,{capture,[1]}]),
  360:     {match,[{3,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABC",".*(?<FOO>abcd).*",[{capture,['FOO']}]),
  361:     {match,[{10,4}]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA",".*(?<FOO>abcd).*",[{capture,['FOO']}]),
  362:     {match,[[{10,4}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA",".*(?<FOO>abcd).*",[global,{capture,['FOO']}]),
  363:     {match,[[{3,4},{3,4}],[{10,4},{10,4}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","(?<FOO>abcd)",[global]),
  364:     {match,[[{3,4},{3,4}],[{10,4},{10,4}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","(?<FOO>abcd)",[global,{capture,all}]),
  365:     {match,[[{3,4},{3,4}],[{10,4},{10,4}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","(?<FOO>abcd)",[global,{capture,all,index}]),
  366:     {match,[[{3,4}],[{10,4}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","(?<FOO>abcd)",[global,{capture,first}]),
  367:     {match,[[{3,4}],[{10,4}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","(?<FOO>abcd)",[global,{capture,all_but_first}]),
  368:     {match,[[<<"bcd">>],[<<"bcd">>]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all_but_first,binary}]),
  369:     {match,[["bcd"],["bcd"]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all_but_first,list}]),
  370:     {match,[["abcd","bcd"],["abcd","bcd"]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all,list}]),
  371:     {match,[[<<"abcd">>,<<"bcd">>],[<<"abcd">>,<<"bcd">>]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all,binary}]),
  372:     {match,[[{3,4},{4,3}],[{10,4},{11,3}]]} = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all,index}]),
  373:     match = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,none,index}]),
  374:     match = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,none,binary}]),
  375:     match = re:run("ABCabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,none,list}]),
  376:     {match,[[<<195,133,98,99,100>>,<<"bcd">>],[<<"abcd">>,<<"bcd">>]]} = re:run("ABCÅbcdABCabcdA",".(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all,binary},unicode]),
  377:     {match,[["Åbcd","bcd"],["abcd","bcd"]]} = re:run(<<"ABC",8#303,8#205,"bcdABCabcdA">>,".(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all,list},unicode]),
  378:     {match,[["Åbcd","bcd"],["abcd","bcd"]]} = re:run("ABCÅbcdABCabcdA",".(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all,list},unicode]),
  379:     {match,[[{3,5},{5,3}],[{11,4},{12,3}]]} = re:run("ABCÅbcdABCabcdA",".(?<FOO>bcd)",[global,{capture,all,index},unicode]),
  380:     ok.
  381: 
  382: %% Test replace with different input types.
  383: replace_input_types(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  384:     <<"abcd">> = re:replace("abcd","Z","X",[{return,binary},unicode]),
  385:     <<"abcd">> = re:replace("abcd","\x{400}","X",[{return,binary},unicode]),
  386:     <<"a",208,128,"cd">> = re:replace(<<"abcd">>,"b","\x{400}",[{return,binary},unicode]),
  387:     ok.
  388: 
  389: %% Test replace with a replacement function.
  390: replace_with_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  391:     <<"ABCD">> = re:replace("abcd", ".", fun(<<C>>, []) -> <<(C - $a + $A)>> end, [global, {return, binary}]),
  392:     <<"AbCd">> = re:replace("abcd", ".", fun(<<C>>, []) when (C - $a) rem 2 =:= 0 -> <<(C - $a + $A)>>; (C, []) -> C end, [global, {return, binary}]),
  393:     <<"b-ad-c">> = re:replace("abcd", "(.)(.)", fun(_, [A, B]) -> <<B/binary, $-, A/binary>> end, [global, {return, binary}]),
  394:     <<"#ab-B#cd">> = re:replace("abcd", ".(.)", fun(Whole, [<<C>>]) -> <<$#, Whole/binary, $-, (C - $a + $A), $#>> end, [{return, binary}]),
  395:     <<"#ab#cd">> = re:replace("abcd", ".(x)?(.)", fun(Whole, [<<>>, _]) -> <<$#, Whole/binary, $#>> end, [{return, binary}]),
  396:     <<"#ab#cd">> = re:replace("abcd", ".(.)(x)?", fun(Whole, [_]) -> <<$#, Whole/binary, $#>> end, [{return, binary}]),
  397:     ok.
  398: 
  399: %% Test return options of replace together with global searching.
  400: replace_return(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  401:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:replace("na","(a","")),
  402:     ok = replacetest(<<"nisse">>,"i","a",[{return,binary}],<<"nasse">>),
  403:     ok = replacetest("ABC\305abcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)","X",[global,{return,binary}],<<"ABCÅXABCXA">>),
  404:     ok = replacetest("ABCÅabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)","X",[global,{return,iodata}],[<<"ABCÅ">>,<<"X">>,<<"ABC">>,<<"X">>|<<"A">>]),
  405:     ok = replacetest("ABCÅabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)","X",[global,{return,list},unicode],"ABCÅXABCXA"),
  406:     ok = replacetest("ABCÅabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)","X",[global,{return,binary},unicode],<<65,66,67,195,133,88,65,66,67,88,65>>),
  407:     ok = replacetest("ABCÅabcdABCabcdA","a(?<FOO>bcd)","X",[{return,binary},unicode],<<65,66,67,195,133,88,65,66,67,97,98,99,100,65>>),
  408:     ok = replacetest("abcdefghijk","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\9X",[{return,binary}],<<"iXk">>),
  409:     ok = replacetest("abcdefghijk","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\10X",[{return,binary}],<<"jXk">>),
  410:     ok = replacetest("abcdefghijk","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\11X",[{return,binary}],<<"Xk">>),
  411:     ok = replacetest("12345678901","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\g9X",[{return,binary}],<<"9X1">>),
  412:     ok = replacetest("12345678901","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\g10X",[{return,binary}],<<"0X1">>),
  413:     ok = replacetest("12345678901","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\g11X",[{return,binary}],<<"X1">>),
  414:     ok = replacetest("12345678901","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\g{9}7",[{return,binary}],<<"971">>),
  415:     ok = replacetest("12345678901","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\g{10}7",[{return,binary}],<<"071">>),
  416:     ok = replacetest("12345678901","(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)(.)","\\g{11}7",[{return,binary}],<<"71">>),
  417:     ok = replacetest("a\x{400}bcd","d","X",[global,{return,list},unicode],"a\x{400}bcX"),
  418:     ok = replacetest("a\x{400}bcd","d","X",[global,{return,binary},unicode],<<"a",208,128,"bcX">>),
  419:     ok = replacetest("a\x{400}bcd","Z","X",[global,{return,list},unicode],"a\x{400}bcd"),
  420:     ok = replacetest("a\x{400}bcd","Z","X",[global,{return,binary},unicode],<<"a",208,128,"bcd">>),
  421:     ok.
  422: 
  423: rtest(Subj, RE, Copt, Ropt, match) ->
  424:     {ok,MP} = re:compile(RE,Copt), 
  425:     {match,_} = re:run(Subj,MP,Ropt),
  426:     ok;
  427: rtest(Subj, RE, Copt, Ropt, nomatch) ->
  428:     {ok,MP} = re:compile(RE,Copt), 
  429:     nomatch = re:run(Subj,MP,Ropt),
  430:     ok;
  431: rtest(Subj, RE, Copt, Ropt, badarg) ->
  432:     {ok,MP} = re:compile(RE,Copt),
  433:     ok = try
  434:              re:run(Subj,MP,Ropt),
  435:              error
  436:          catch
  437:              error:badarg -> ok
  438:          end.
  439: 
  440: ctest(_,RE,Options,false,_) ->
  441:     case re:compile(RE,Options) of
  442: 	{ok,_} ->
  443: 	    error;
  444: 	{error,_} ->
  445: 	    ok
  446:     end;
  447: ctest(Subject,RE,Options,true,Result) ->
  448:     {ok, Prog} = re:compile(RE,Options),
  449:     Result = re:run(Subject,Prog,[]),
  450:     ok.
  451: 
  452: crtest(_,RE,Options,false,_) ->
  453:     case (catch re:run("",RE,Options)) of
  454: 	{'EXIT',{badarg,_}} ->
  455: 	    ok;
  456: 	_ ->
  457: 	    error
  458:     end;
  459: crtest(Subject,RE,Options,true,Result) ->
  460:     try
  461: 	Result = re:run(Subject,RE,Options),
  462: 	ok
  463:     catch
  464: 	_:_ ->
  465: 	    error
  466:     end.
  467: 
  468: replacetest(Subject,RE,Replacement,Options,Result) ->
  469:     Result = re:replace(Subject,RE,Replacement,Options),
  470:     {CompileOptions,ReplaceOptions} = lists:partition(fun copt/1, Options),
  471:     {ok,MP} = re:compile(RE,CompileOptions),
  472:     Result = re:replace(Subject,MP,Replacement,ReplaceOptions),
  473:     ok.
  474: 
  475: splittest(Subject,RE,Options,Result) ->
  476:     Result = re:split(Subject,RE,Options),
  477:     {CompileOptions,SplitOptions} = lists:partition(fun copt/1, Options),
  478:     {ok,MP} = re:compile(RE,CompileOptions),
  479:     Result = re:split(Subject,MP,SplitOptions),
  480:     ok.
  481: 
  482: copt(caseless) -> true;
  483: copt(no_start_optimize) -> true;
  484: copt(never_utf) -> true;
  485: copt(ucp) -> true;
  486: copt(dollar_endonly) -> true;
  487: copt(dotall) -> true;
  488: copt(extended) -> true;
  489: copt(firstline) -> true;
  490: copt(multiline) -> true;
  491: copt(no_auto_capture) -> true;
  492: copt(dupnames) -> true;
  493: copt(ungreedy) -> true;
  494: copt(unicode) -> true;
  495: copt(_) -> false.
  496: 
  497: %% Test split with autogenerated erlang module.
  498: split_autogen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  499:     re_testoutput1_split_test:run(),
  500:     ok.
  501: 
  502: %% Test special options to split.
  503: split_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  504:     ok = splittest("", "", [trim], []),
  505:     ok = splittest("", " ", [trim], []),
  506:     ok = splittest("", "()", [group, trim], []),
  507:     ok = splittest("", "( )", [group, trim], []),
  508:     ok = splittest("a b c ","( )",[group,trim],[[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b">>,<<" ">>],[<<"c">>,<<" ">>]]),
  509:     ok = splittest("a b c ","( )",[group,{parts,0}],[[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b">>,<<" ">>],[<<"c">>,<<" ">>]]),
  510:     ok = splittest("a b c ","( )",[{parts,infinity},group],[[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b">>,<<" ">>],[<<"c">>,<<" ">>],[<<>>]]),
  511:     ok = splittest("a b c ","( )",[group],[[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b">>,<<" ">>],[<<"c">>,<<" ">>],[<<>>]]),
  512:     ok = splittest(" a b c d ","( +)",[group,trim],[[<<>>,<<" ">>],[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b">>,<<" ">>],[<<"c">>,<<" ">>],[<<"d">>,<<" ">>]]),
  513:     ok = splittest(" a b c d ","( +)",[{parts,0},group],[[<<>>,<<" ">>],[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b">>,<<" ">>],[<<"c">>,<<" ">>],[<<"d">>,<<" ">>]]),
  514:     ok = splittest(" a b c d ","( +)",[{parts,infinity},group],[[<<>>,<<" ">>],[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b">>,<<" ">>],[<<"c">>,<<" ">>],[<<"d">>,<<" ">>],[<<>>]]),
  515:     ok = splittest("a b c d","( +)",[{parts,2},group],[[<<"a">>,<<" ">>],[<<"b c d">>]]),
  516:     ok = splittest([967]++" b c d","( +)",[{parts,2},group,{return,list},unicode],[[[967]," "],["b c d"]]),
  517:     ok = splittest([967]++" b c d","( +)",[{parts,2},group,{return,binary},unicode],[[<<207,135>>,<<" ">>],[<<"b c d">>]]),
  518:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:split([967]++" b c d","( +)",[{parts,2},group,{return,binary}])),
  519:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:split("a b c d","( +)",[{parts,-2}])),
  520:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:split("a b c d","( +)",[{parts,banan}])),
  521:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:split("a b c d","( +)",[{capture,all}])),
  522:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:split("a b c d","( +)",[{capture,[],binary}])),
  523:     %% Parts 0 is equal to no parts specification (implicit strip)
  524:     ok = splittest("a b c d","( *)",[{parts,0},{return,list}],["a"," ","b"," ","c"," ","d"]),
  525:     ok.
  526: 
  527: join([]) -> [];
  528: join([A]) -> [A];
  529: join([H|T]) -> [H,<<":">>|join(T)].
  530: 
  531: %% Some special cases of split that are easy to get wrong.
  532: split_specials(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  533:     %% More or less just to remember these icky cases
  534:     <<"::abd:f">> =
  535: 	iolist_to_binary(join(re:split("abdf","^(?!(ab)de|x)(abd)(f)",[trim]))),
  536:     <<":abc2xyzabc3">> =
  537: 	iolist_to_binary(join(re:split("abc1abc2xyzabc3","\\Aabc.",[trim]))),
  538:     ok.
  539: 
  540: 
  541: %% Test that errors are handled correctly by the erlang code.
  542: error_handling(_Config) ->
  543:     %% This test checks the exception tuples manufactured in the erlang
  544:     %% code to hide the trapping from the user at least when it comes to errors
  545: 
  546:     %% The malformed precomiled RE is detected after
  547:     %% the trap to re:grun from grun, in the grun function clause
  548:     %% that handles precompiled expressions
  549:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,run,["apa",{1,2,3,4},[global]],_},
  550:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  551: 	(catch re:run("apa",{1,2,3,4},[global])),
  552:     %% An invalid capture list will also cause a badarg late,
  553:     %% but with a non pre compiled RE, the exception should be thrown by the
  554:     %% grun function clause that handles RE's compiled implicitly by
  555:     %% the run/3 BIF before trapping.
  556:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,run,["apa","p",[{capture,[1,{a}]},global]],_},
  557:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  558: 	(catch re:run("apa","p",[{capture,[1,{a}]},global])),
  559:     %% And so the case of a precompiled expression together with
  560:     %% a compile-option (binary and list subject):
  561:     {ok,RE} = re:compile("(p)"),
  562:     {match,[[{1,1},{1,1}]]} = re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[global]),
  563:     {match,[[{1,1},{1,1}]]} = re:run("apa",RE,[global]),
  564:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,run,
  565: 		      [<<"apa">>,
  566: 		       {re_pattern,1,0,_,_},
  567: 		       [global,unicode]],_},
  568:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  569: 	(catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[global,unicode])),
  570:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,run,
  571: 		      ["apa",
  572: 		       {re_pattern,1,0,_,_},
  573: 		       [global,unicode]],_},
  574:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  575: 	(catch re:run("apa",RE,[global,unicode])),
  576:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run("apa","(p",[])),
  577:     {error, {compile, {_,_}}} = re:run("apa","(p",[report_errors]),
  578:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run("apa","(p",[global])),
  579:     {error, {compile, {_,_}}} = re:run("apa","(p",[report_errors,global]),
  580:     %% Badly formed options
  581:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,["global"])),
  582:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{offset,-1}])),
  583:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{offset,ett}])),
  584:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{captore,[1,2],binary}])),
  585:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{capture,[1,2],binary,list}])),
  586:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{capture,[1,2],bunary}])),
  587:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{capture,{1,2},binary}])),
  588:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{newline,3}])),
  589:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{newline,apa}])),
  590:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{njuline,cr}])),
  591:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{<<"newline">>,cr}])),
  592:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[global|dupnames])),
  593:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run([<<"ap">>|$a],RE,[])), % Not an IO-list
  594:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:compile([<<"ap">>|$a],[])), % Not an IO-list
  595:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,[{capture,[0|1],binary}])),
  596:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,
  597: 					[{capture,[<<"apa">>|1],binary}])), 
  598:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,RE,
  599: 					[{capture,[[<<"ap">>|$a]],binary}])), 
  600:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,[<<"(p">>|41],[])), 
  601:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,{re_pattern,3,0,0,[]},[])),
  602:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,{re_pattern,3,0,0,<<"apa">>},[])),
  603:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa">>,{re_pattern,3,0,0,<<"apa",3:2>>},[])),
  604:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run(<<"apa",2:2>>,<<"(p)">>,[{capture,[0,1],binary}])), 
  605:     <<_:4,Temp:3/binary,_:4>> = <<38,23,6,18>>,
  606:     {match,[{1,1},{1,1}]} = re:run(Temp,<<"(p)">>,[]), % Unaligned works 
  607:     %% The replace errors:
  608:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,["apa",{1,2,3,4},"X",[]],_},
  609:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  610: 	(catch re:replace("apa",{1,2,3,4},"X",[])),
  611:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,["apa",{1,2,3,4},"X",[global]],_},
  612:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  613: 	(catch re:replace("apa",{1,2,3,4},"X",[global])),
  614:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,
  615: 		      ["apa",
  616: 		       {re_pattern,1,0,_,_},
  617: 		       "X",
  618: 		       [unicode]],_},
  619:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  620: 	(catch re:replace("apa",RE,"X",[unicode])),
  621:     <<"aXa">> = iolist_to_binary(re:replace("apa","p","X",[])),
  622:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,
  623: 		      ["apa","p","X",[report_errors]],_},
  624:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  625: 	(catch iolist_to_binary(re:replace("apa","p","X",
  626: 					   [report_errors]))),
  627:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,
  628: 		      ["apa","p","X",[{capture,all,binary}]],_},
  629:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  630: 	(catch iolist_to_binary(re:replace("apa","p","X",
  631: 					   [{capture,all,binary}]))),
  632:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,
  633: 		      ["apa","p","X",[{capture,all}]],_},
  634:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  635: 	(catch iolist_to_binary(re:replace("apa","p","X",
  636: 					   [{capture,all}]))),
  637:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,
  638: 		      ["apa","p","X",[{return,banana}]],_},
  639:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  640: 	(catch iolist_to_binary(re:replace("apa","p","X",
  641: 					   [{return,banana}]))),
  642:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:replace("apa","(p","X",[])),
  643:     %% Badarg, not compile error.
  644:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,replace,
  645: 		      ["apa","(p","X",[{return,banana}]],_},
  646:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  647: 	(catch iolist_to_binary(re:replace("apa","(p","X",
  648: 					   [{return,banana}]))),
  649:     %% And the split errors:
  650:     [<<"a">>,<<"a">>] = (catch re:split("apa","p",[])),
  651:     [<<"a">>,<<"p">>,<<"a">>] = (catch re:split("apa",RE,[])),
  652:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,["apa","p",[report_errors]],_},
  653:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  654: 	(catch re:split("apa","p",[report_errors])),
  655:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,["apa","p",[global]],_},
  656:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  657: 	(catch re:split("apa","p",[global])),
  658:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,["apa","p",[{capture,all}]],_},
  659:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  660: 	(catch re:split("apa","p",[{capture,all}])),
  661:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,["apa","p",[{capture,all,binary}]],_},
  662:                      {?MODULE, ?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  663: 	(catch re:split("apa","p",[{capture,all,binary}])),
  664:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,["apa",{1,2,3,4}],_},
  665:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  666: 	(catch re:split("apa",{1,2,3,4})),
  667:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,["apa",{1,2,3,4},[]],_},
  668:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  669: 	(catch re:split("apa",{1,2,3,4},[])),
  670:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,
  671: 		      ["apa",
  672: 		       RE,
  673: 		       [unicode]],_},
  674:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  675: 	(catch re:split("apa",RE,[unicode])),
  676:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,
  677: 		      ["apa",
  678: 		       RE,
  679: 		       [{return,banana}]],_},
  680:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  681: 	(catch re:split("apa",RE,[{return,banana}])),
  682:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,
  683: 		      ["apa",
  684: 		       RE,
  685: 		       [banana]],_},
  686:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  687: 	(catch re:split("apa",RE,[banana])),
  688:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:split("apa","(p")),
  689:     %%Exception on bad argument, not compilation error
  690:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[{re,split,
  691: 		      ["apa",
  692: 		       "(p",
  693: 		       [banana]],_},
  694:                      {?MODULE,?FUNCTION_NAME,?FUNCTION_ARITY,_} | _]}} =
  695: 	(catch re:split("apa","(p",[banana])),
  696:     ok.
  697: 
  698: %% Fix as in http://vcs.pcre.org/viewvc?revision=360&view=revision
  699: pcre_cve_2008_2371(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  700:     %% Make sure it doesn't crash the emulator.
  701:     re:compile(<<"(?i)[\xc3\xa9\xc3\xbd]|[\xc3\xa9\xc3\xbdA]">>, [unicode]),
  702:     ok.
  703: 
  704: %% Patch from
  705: %% http://vcs.pcre.org/viewvc/code/trunk/pcre_compile.c?r1=504&r2=505&view=patch
  706: pcre_compile_workspace_overflow(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  707:     N = 1180,
  708:     ExpStr = "Got expected error: ",
  709:     case re:compile([lists:duplicate(N, $(), lists:duplicate(N, $))]) of
  710:         {error, {"regular expression is too complicated" = Str,2360}} ->
  711:             {comment, ExpStr ++ Str};
  712:         {error, {"parentheses are too deeply nested (stack check)" = Str, _No}} ->
  713:             {comment, ExpStr ++ Str};
  714:         Other ->
  715:             ct:fail({unexpected, Other})
  716:     end.
  717: 
  718: %% Make sure matches that really loop infinitely actually fail.
  719: re_infinite_loop(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  720:     Str =
  721:         "http:/www.flickr.com/slideShow/index.gne?group_id=&user_id=69845378@N0",
  722:     EMail_regex = "[a-z0-9!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+"
  723:         ++ "(\.[a-z0-9!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+)*"
  724:         ++ "@.*([a-z0-9](?:[a-z0-9-]*[a-z0-9])?\.)+"
  725:         ++ "([a-zA-Z]{2}|com|org|net|gov|mil"
  726:         ++ "|biz|info|mobi|name|aero|jobs|museum)",
  727:     nomatch = re:run(Str, EMail_regex),
  728:     nomatch = re:run(Str, EMail_regex, [global]),
  729:     {error,match_limit} = re:run(Str, EMail_regex,[report_errors]),
  730:     {error,match_limit} = re:run(Str, EMail_regex,[report_errors,global]),
  731:     ok.
  732: 
  733: %% Check for nasty bug where accented graphemes can make PCRE back
  734: %% past beginning of subject.
  735: re_backwards_accented(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  736:     match = re:run(<<65,204,128,65,204,128,97,98,99>>,
  737: 		   <<"\\X?abc">>,
  738: 		   [unicode,{capture,none}]),
  739:     ok.
  740: 
  741: %% Check correct handling of dupnames option to re.
  742: opt_dupnames(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  743:     Days = ["Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday","Sunday"],
  744:     _ = [ begin
  745: 	      Short = lists:sublist(Day,3),
  746: 	      {match,[Short]} =
  747: 		  re:run(Day,
  748: 			 "(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?|(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|"
  749: 			 "(?<DN>Wed)(?:nesday)?|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  750: 			 "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  751: 			 [dupnames, {capture, ['DN'], list}])
  752: 	  end || Day <- Days ],
  753:     _ = [ begin
  754: 	      Short = list_to_binary(lists:sublist(Day,3)),
  755: 	      {match,[Short]} =
  756: 		  re:run(Day,
  757: 			 "(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?|(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|"
  758: 			 "(?<DN>Wed)(?:nesday)?|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  759: 			 "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  760: 			 [dupnames, {capture, ['DN'], binary}])
  761: 	  end || Day <- Days ],
  762:     _ = [ begin
  763: 	      {match,[{0,3}]} =
  764: 		  re:run(Day,
  765: 			 "(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?|(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|"
  766: 			 "(?<DN>Wed)(?:nesday)?|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  767: 			 "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  768: 			 [dupnames, {capture, ['DN'], index}])
  769: 	  end || Day <- Days ],
  770:     {match,[{0,1},{1,3},{7,1}]} = re:run("SMondayX","(?<Skrap>.)(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?(?<Skrap2>.)|"
  771: 					 "(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|(?<DN>Wed)nesday|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  772: 					 "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  773: 					 [dupnames, {capture, ['Skrap','DN','Skrap2'],index}]),
  774:     {match,[{-1,0},{0,3},{-1,0}]} = re:run("Wednesday","(?<Skrap>.)(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?(?<Skrap2>.)|"
  775: 					   "(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|(?<DN>Wed)nesday|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  776: 					   "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  777: 					   [dupnames, {capture, ['Skrap','DN','Skrap2'],index}]),
  778:     nomatch = re:run("Wednsday","(?<Skrap>.)(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?(?<Skrap2>.)|"
  779: 		     "(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|(?<DN>Wed)nesday|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  780: 		     "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  781: 		     [dupnames, {capture, ['Skrap','DN','Skrap2'],index}]),
  782:     {match,[<<>>]} = re:run("Subject","b",[dupnames,{capture,['B'],binary}]),
  783:     {match,[<<"S">>,<<"u">>,<<"b">>,<<"j">>,<<"e">>,<<"c">>,
  784: 	    <<"t">>,<<"I">>,<<"s">>,<<"M">>,<<"o">>,<<"r">>,<<"e">>,
  785: 	    <<"T">>,<<"h">>,<<"a">>,<<"n">>,<<"T">>,<<"e">>,<<"n">>]} =
  786: 	re:run("SubjectIsMoreThanTen",
  787: 	       "(?<S>S)(?<u>u)(?<b>b)(?<j>j)(?<e>e)(?<c>c)(?<t>t)"
  788: 	       "(?<I>I)(?<s>s)(?<M>M)(?<o>o)(?<r>r)(?<e>e)(?<T>T)"
  789: 	       "(?<h>h)(?<a>a)(?<n>n)(?<T>T)(?<e>e)(?<n>n)",
  790: 	       [dupnames,{capture,['S','u','b','j','e','c','t',
  791: 				   'I','s','M','o','r','e','T',
  792: 				   'h','a','n','T','e','n'],binary}]),
  793:     {match,[<<"S">>,<<"u">>,<<"b">>,<<"j">>,<<"e">>,<<"c">>,
  794: 	    <<"t">>,<<"I">>,<<"s">>,<<"M">>,<<"o">>,<<"r">>,<<"e">>,
  795: 	    <<"T">>,<<"h">>,<<"a">>,<<"n">>,<<"T">>,<<"e">>,<<"n">>]} =
  796: 	re:run("SubjectIsMoreThanTen",
  797: 	       "(?<S>S)(?<u>u)(?<b>b)(?<j>j)(?<e>e)(?<c>c)(?<t>t)"
  798: 	       "(?<I>I)(?<s>s)(?<M>M)(?<o>o)(?<r>r)(?<e>e)(?<T>T)"
  799: 	       "(?<h>h)(?<a>a)(?<n>n)(?<T>T)(?<e>e)(?<n>n)",
  800: 	       [dupnames,
  801: 		{capture,all_but_first,list},
  802: 		{capture,['S','u','b','j','e','c','t',
  803: 			  'I','s','M','o','r','e','T',
  804: 			  'h','a','n','T','e','n'],binary}]),
  805:     {match,[<<"S">>,<<"u">>,<<"b">>,<<"j">>,<<"e">>,<<"c">>,
  806: 	    <<"t">>,<<"I">>,<<"s">>,<<"M">>,<<"o">>,<<"r">>,<<"e">>,
  807: 	    <<"T">>,<<"h">>,<<"a">>,<<"n">>,<<"T">>,<<"e">>,<<"n">>]} =
  808: 	re:run("SubjectIsMoreThanTen",
  809: 	       "(?<S>S)(?<u>u)(?<b>b)(?<j>j)(?<e>e)(?<c>c)(?<t>t)"
  810: 	       "(?<I>I)(?<s>s)(?<M>M)(?<o>o)(?<r>r)(?<e>e)(?<T>T)"
  811: 	       "(?<h>h)(?<a>a)(?<n>n)(?<T>T)(?<e>e)(?<n>n)",
  812: 	       [dupnames,
  813: 		{capture,["S","u","b","j","e","c","t",
  814: 			  "I","s","M","o","r","e","T",
  815: 			  "h","a","n","T","e","n"],binary}]), 
  816:     {match,[<<"S">>,<<"u">>,<<"b">>,<<"j">>,<<"e">>,<<"c">>,
  817: 	    <<"t">>,<<"I">>,<<"s">>,<<"M">>,<<"o">>,<<"r">>,<<"e">>,
  818: 	    <<"T">>,<<"h">>,<<"a">>,<<"n">>,<<"T">>,<<"e">>,<<"n">>]} =
  819: 	re:run("SubjectIsMoreThanTen",
  820: 	       "(?<S>S)(?<u>u)(?<b>b)(?<j>j)(?<e>e)(?<c>c)(?<t>t)"
  821: 	       "(?<I>I)(?<s>s)(?<M>M)(?<o>o)(?<r>r)(?<e>e)(?<T>T)"
  822: 	       "(?<h>h)(?<a>a)(?<n>n)(?<T>T)(?<e>e)(?<then>n)",
  823: 	       [dupnames,
  824: 		{capture,["S","u","b","j","e","c","t",
  825: 			  "I","s","M","o","r","e","T",
  826: 			  "h","a","n","T","e","then"],binary}]), 
  827:     ok.
  828: 
  829: %% Test capturing of all_names.
  830: opt_all_names(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  831:     Days = ["Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday","Sunday"],
  832:     {match,[{1,3},{0,1},{7,1}]} = re:run("SMondayX","(?<Skrap>.)(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?(?<Skrap2>.)|"
  833: 					 "(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|(?<DN>Wed)nesday|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  834: 					 "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  835: 					 [dupnames, {capture, all_names,index}]),
  836:     {match,[{0,3},{-1,0},{-1,0}]} = re:run("Wednesday","(?<Skrap>.)(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?(?<Skrap2>.)|"
  837: 					   "(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|(?<DN>Wed)nesday|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  838: 					   "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  839: 					   [dupnames, {capture, all_names,index}]),
  840: 
  841:     _ = [ begin
  842: 	      {match,[{0,3}]} =
  843: 		  re:run(Day,
  844: 			 "(?<DN>Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?|(?<DN>Tue)(?:sday)?|"
  845: 			 "(?<DN>Wed)(?:nesday)?|(?<DN>Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  846: 			 "(?<DN>Sat)(?:urday)?",
  847: 			 [dupnames, {capture, all_names, index}])
  848: 	  end || Day <- Days ],
  849:     _ = [ begin
  850: 	      match =
  851: 		  re:run(Day,
  852: 			 "(Mon|Fri|Sun)(?:day)?|(Tue)(?:sday)?|"
  853: 			 "(Wed)(?:nesday)?|(Thu)(?:rsday)?|"
  854: 			 "(Sat)(?:urday)?",
  855: 			 [dupnames, {capture, all_names, index}])
  856: 	  end || Day <- Days ],
  857:     {match,[{0,1},{-1,0},{-1,0}]} = re:run("A","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, index}]),
  858:     {match,[{-1,0},{0,1},{-1,0}]} = re:run("B","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, index}]),
  859:     {match,[{-1,0},{-1,0},{0,1}]} = re:run("C","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, index}]),
  860:     {match,[<<"A">>,<<>>,<<>>]} = re:run("A","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  861:     {match,[<<>>,<<"B">>,<<>>]} = re:run("B","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  862:     {match,[<<>>,<<>>,<<"C">>]} = re:run("C","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  863:     {match,["A",[],[]]} = re:run("A","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, list}]),
  864:     {match,[[],"B",[]]} = re:run("B","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, list}]),
  865:     {match,[[],[],"C"]} = re:run("C","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",[{capture, all_names, list}]),
  866:     {match,[{-1,0},{-1,0},{0,1}]} = re:run("A","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, index}]),
  867:     {match,[{-1,0},{0,1},{-1,0}]} = re:run("B","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, index}]),
  868:     {match,[{0,1},{-1,0},{-1,0}]} = re:run("C","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, index}]),
  869:     {match,[<<>>,<<>>,<<"A">>]} = re:run("A","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  870:     {match,[<<>>,<<>>,<<"A">>]} = re:run("A","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_but_first, binary},{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  871:     {match,[<<>>,<<"B">>,<<>>]} = re:run("B","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  872:     {match,[<<"C">>,<<>>,<<>>]} = re:run("C","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  873:     {match,[[],[],"A"]} = re:run("A","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, list}]),
  874:     {match,[[],"B",[]]} = re:run("B","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, list}]),
  875:     {match,["C",[],[]]} = re:run("C","(?<C>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",[{capture, all_names, list}]),
  876:     {match,[[<<>>,<<>>,<<"C">>],
  877: 	    [<<>>,<<>>,<<"C">>],
  878: 	    [<<>>,<<>>,<<"C">>]]} = re:run("CCC","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)",
  879: 					   [global,{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  880:     {match,[[<<"C">>,<<>>],
  881: 	    [<<>>,<<"B">>],
  882: 	    [<<"C">>,<<>>]]} = re:run("CBC","(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C)",
  883: 				      [global,dupnames,{capture, all_names, binary}]),
  884:     {match,[[]]} = re:run("ABCE","(?<A>D)|(?<B>E)|(?<A>F)",[dupnames,{capture,['A'],list}]),
  885:     {match,["D"]} = re:run("ABCDE","(?<A>D)|(?<B>E)|(?<A>F)",[dupnames,{capture,['A'],list}]),
  886:     {match,["F"]} = re:run("ABCFE","(?<A>D)|(?<B>E)|(?<A>F)",[dupnames,{capture,['A'],list}]),
  887:     {match,["F",[]]} = re:run("ABCFE","(?<A>D)|(?<B>E)|(?<A>F)",[dupnames,{capture,['A','B'],list}]),
  888:     {match,[[],"E"]} = re:run("ABCE","(?<A>D)|(?<B>E)|(?<A>F)",[dupnames,{capture,['A','B'],list}]),
  889:     {match,[[],"E"]} = re:run("ABCE","(?<A>D)|(?<B>E)|(?<A>F)",[dupnames,{capture,all_names,list}]),
  890:     {match,[{-1,0},{3,1}]}  = re:run("ABCE","(?<A>D)|(?<B>E)|(?<A>F)",[dupnames,{capture,all_names,index}]),
  891:     match = re:run("Subject","b",[dupnames,{capture,all_names,binary}]),
  892:     {match,[<<"I">>,<<"M">>,<<"S">>,<<"T">>,<<"a">>,<<"b">>,              
  893: 	    <<"c">>,<<"e">>,<<"h">>,<<"j">>,<<"n">>,<<"o">>,<<"r">>,
  894: 	    <<"s">>,<<"t">>,<<"u">>]} =
  895: 	re:run("SubjectIsMoreThanTen","(?<S>S)(?<u>u)(?<b>b)(?<j>j)"
  896: 	       "(?<e>e)(?<c>c)(?<t>t)(?<I>I)(?<s>s)(?<M>M)(?<o>o)(?<r>r)"
  897: 	       "(?<e>e)(?<T>T)(?<h>h)(?<a>a)(?<n>n)(?<T>T)(?<e>e)(?<n>n)",
  898: 	       [dupnames,{capture,all_names,binary}]),
  899:     ok.
  900: 
  901: %% Test the minimal inspect function.
  902: inspect(Config) when is_list(Config)->
  903:     {ok,MP} = re:compile("(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<C>C)."),
  904:     {namelist,[<<"A">>,<<"B">>,<<"C">>]} = re:inspect(MP,namelist),
  905:     {ok,MPD} = re:compile("(?<A>A)|(?<B>B)|(?<A>C).",[dupnames]),
  906:     {namelist,[<<"A">>,<<"B">>]} = re:inspect(MPD,namelist),
  907:     {ok,MPN} = re:compile("(A)|(B)|(C)."),
  908:     {namelist,[]} = re:inspect(MPN,namelist),
  909:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:inspect(MPD,namelistk)),
  910:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:inspect({re_pattern,3,0,0,<<"kalle">>},namelist)),
  911:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:inspect({re_pattern,3,0,0,<<"kalle",2:2>>},namelist)),
  912:     ok.
  913: 
  914: %% Test that the no_start_optimize compilation flag works.
  915: opt_no_start_optimize(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  916:     {match, [{3,3}]} = re:run("DEFABC","(*COMMIT)ABC",[]), % Start optimization makes this result wrong!
  917:     nomatch = re:run("DEFABC","(*COMMIT)ABC",[no_start_optimize]), % This is the correct result...
  918:     ok.
  919: 
  920: %% Check that the never_utf option works.
  921: opt_never_utf(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  922:     {match,[{0,3}]} = re:run("ABC","ABC",[never_utf]),
  923:     {match,[{0,3}]} = re:run("ABC","(*UTF)ABC",[]),
  924:     {ok,_} = re:compile("(*UTF)ABC"),
  925:     {ok,_} = re:compile("(*UTF)ABC",[unicode]),
  926:     {ok,_} = re:compile("(*UTF8)ABC"),
  927:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run("ABC","ABC",[unicode,never_utf])),
  928:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run("ABC","(*UTF)ABC",[never_utf])),
  929:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch re:run("ABC","(*UTF8)ABC",[never_utf])),
  930:     {error,_} = (catch re:compile("ABC",[unicode,never_utf])),
  931:     {error,_} = (catch re:compile("(*UTF)ABC",[never_utf])),
  932:     {error,_} = (catch re:compile("(*UTF8)ABC",[never_utf])),
  933:     ok.
  934: 
  935: %% Check that the ucp option is passed to PCRE.
  936: opt_ucp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  937:     {match,[{0,1}]} = re:run([$a],"\\w",[unicode]),
  938:     nomatch = re:run([229],"\\w",[unicode]), % Latin1 do not work without UCP anymore, ASCII is default
  939:     nomatch = re:run([1024],"\\w",[unicode]), % and neither do non Latin1 code points.
  940:     {match,[{0,2}]} = re:run([229],"\\w",[unicode,ucp]),  % Need ucp for Latin1
  941:     {match,[{0,2}]} = re:run([1024],"\\w",[unicode,ucp]), % Any Unicode word character works with 'ucp'
  942:     ok.
  943: 
  944: %% Check that the match_limit and match_limit_recursion options work.
  945: match_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  946:     nomatch = re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[]),
  947:     nomatch = re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[{match_limit,3000}]),
  948:     nomatch = re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[{match_limit_recursion,10}]),
  949:     nomatch = re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[report_errors]),
  950:     {error,match_limit} = re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[{match_limit,3000},
  951: 							     report_errors]),
  952:     {error,match_limit_recursion} = 
  953: 	re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[{match_limit_recursion,10},
  954: 					   report_errors]),
  955:     {error,match_limit} = re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[{match_limit,3000},
  956: 							     report_errors,global]),
  957:     {error,match_limit_recursion} = 
  958: 	re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",[{match_limit_recursion,10},
  959: 					   report_errors,global]),
  960:     ["aaaaaaaaaaaaaz"] = re:split("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",
  961: 				  [{match_limit_recursion,10},{return,list}]),
  962:     ["aaaaaaaaaaaaaz"] = re:split("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",
  963: 				  [{match_limit,3000},{return,list}]),
  964:     "aaaaaaaaaaaaaz" = re:replace("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz","!",
  965: 				  [{match_limit_recursion,10},{return,list}]),
  966:     "aaaaaaaaaaaaaz" = re:replace("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz","!",
  967: 				  [{match_limit,3000},{return,list}]),
  968:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} = (catch re:replace("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz","!",
  969: 					     [{match_limit_recursion,-1},{return,list}])),
  970:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} = (catch re:replace("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz","!",
  971: 					     [{match_limit,-1},{return,list}])),
  972:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} = (catch re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",
  973: 					 [{match_limit_recursion,-1},
  974: 					  report_errors,global])),
  975:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} = (catch re:run("aaaaaaaaaaaaaz","(a+)*zz",
  976: 					 [{match_limit,-1},
  977: 					  report_errors,global])),
  978:     ok.
  979: %% Test that we get sub-binaries if subject is a binary and we capture
  980: %% binaries.
  981: sub_binaries(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  982:     %% The GC can auto-convert tiny sub-binaries to heap binaries, so we
  983:     %% extract large sequences to make the test more stable.
  984:     Bin = << <<I>> || I <- lists:seq(1, 4096) >>,
  985:     {match,[B,C]}=re:run(Bin,"a(.+)$",[{capture,all,binary}]),
  986:     true = byte_size(B) =/= byte_size(C),
  987:     4096 = binary:referenced_byte_size(B),
  988:     4096 = binary:referenced_byte_size(C),
  989:     {match,[D]}=re:run(Bin,"a(.+)$",[{capture,[1],binary}]),
  990:     4096 = binary:referenced_byte_size(D),
  991:     ok.
  992: 
  993: bad_utf8_subject(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  994:     %% OTP-16553: re:run() did not badarg
  995:     %% if both pattern and subject was binaries
  996:     %% even though subject contained illegal
  997:     %% utf8...
  998: 
  999:     %% OTP-19015: re:run() ended up in an infinite loop
 1000:     %% if both pattern and subject was binaries and
 1001:     %% subject was long enough to trigger a yield.
 1002: 
 1003:     nomatch = re:run(<<255,255,255>>, <<"a">>, []),
 1004:     nomatch = re:run(<<255,255,255>>, "a", []),
 1005:     nomatch = re:run(<<"aaa">>, <<255>>, []),
 1006:     nomatch = re:run(<<"aaa">>, [255], []),
 1007:     {match,[{0,1}]} = re:run(<<255,255,255>>, <<255>>, []),
 1008:     {match,[{0,1}]} = re:run(<<255,255,255>>, [255], []),
 1009:     [
 1010:      begin
 1011:          %% Badarg on illegal utf8 in subject as of OTP 23...
 1012:          try
 1013:              re:run(<<Prefix/binary, 255,255,255>>, <<"a">>, [unicode]),
 1014:              error(unexpected)
 1015:          catch
 1016:              error:badarg ->
 1017:                  ok
 1018:          end,
 1019:          try
 1020:              re:run(<<Prefix/binary, 255,255,255>>, "a", [unicode]),
 1021:              error(unexpected)
 1022:          catch
 1023:              error:badarg ->
 1024:                  ok
 1025:          end,
 1026:          try
 1027:              re:run(<<Prefix/binary, "aaa">>, <<255>>, [unicode]),
 1028:              error(unexpected)
 1029:          catch
 1030:              error:badarg ->
 1031:                  ok
 1032:          end,
 1033:          nomatch = re:run(<<Prefix/binary, "aaa">>, [255], [unicode]),
 1034:          try
 1035:              re:run(<<Prefix/binary, 255,255,255>>, <<255>>, [unicode]),
 1036:              error(unexpected)
 1037:          catch
 1038:              error:badarg ->
 1039:                  ok
 1040:          end,
 1041:          try
 1042:              re:run(<<Prefix/binary, 255,255,255>>, [255], [unicode]),
 1043:              error(unexpected)
 1044:          catch
 1045:              error:badarg ->
 1046:                  ok
 1047:          end
 1048:      end || Prefix <- [<<>>, iolist_to_binary(lists:duplicate(100000, $a))]],
 1049:     ok.
 1050: 
 1051: error_info(_Config) ->
 1052:     BadRegexp = {re_pattern,0,0,0,<<"xyz">>},
 1053:     BadErr = "neither an iodata term",
 1054:     {ok,GoodRegexp} = re:compile(".*"),
 1055:     InvalidRegexp = <<"(.*))">>,
 1056:     InvalidErr = "could not parse regular expression\n.*unmatched closing parenthesis.*",
 1057: 
 1058:     L = [{compile, [not_iodata]},
 1059:          {compile, [not_iodata, not_list],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"}]},
 1060:          {compile, [<<".*">>, [a|b]]},
 1061:          {compile, [<<".*">>, [bad_option]]},
 1062:          {compile, [{a,b}, [bad_option]],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"}]},
 1063: 
 1064:          {grun, 3},                             %Internal.
 1065: 
 1066:          {inspect,[BadRegexp, namelist]},
 1067:          {inspect,["", namelist]},
 1068:          {inspect,[GoodRegexp, 999]},
 1069:          {inspect,[GoodRegexp, bad_inspect_item]},
 1070: 
 1071:          {internal_run, 4},                     %Internal.
 1072: 
 1073:          {replace, [{a,b}, {x,y}, {z,z}],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"},{3,".*"}]},
 1074:          {replace, [{a,b}, BadRegexp, {z,z}],[{1,".*"},{2,BadErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1075:          {replace, [{a,b}, InvalidRegexp, {z,z}],[{1,".*"},{2,InvalidErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1076: 
 1077:          {replace, [{a,b}, {x,y}, {z,z}, [a|b]],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"},{3,".*"},{4,".*"}]},
 1078:          {replace, [{a,b}, BadRegexp, [bad_option]],[{1,".*"},{2,BadErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1079:          {replace, [{a,b}, InvalidRegexp, [bad_option]],[{1,".*"},{2,InvalidErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1080:          {replace, ["", "", {z,z}, not_a_list],[{3,".*"},{4,".*"}]},
 1081: 
 1082:          {run, [{a,b}, {x,y}],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"}]},
 1083:          {run, [{a,b}, ".*"]},
 1084:          {run, ["abc", {x,y}]},
 1085:          {run, ["abc", BadRegexp],[{2,BadErr}]},
 1086:          {run, ["abc", InvalidRegexp],[{2,InvalidErr}]},
 1087: 
 1088:          {run, [{a,b}, {x,y}, []],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"}]},
 1089:          {run, ["abc", BadRegexp, []],[{2,BadErr}]},
 1090:          {run, ["abc", InvalidRegexp, []],[{2,InvalidErr}]},
 1091:          {run, [{a,b}, {x,y}, [a|b]],[{1,".*"},{2,".*"},{3,".*"}]},
 1092:          {run, [{a,b}, ".*", bad_options],[{1,".*"},{3,".*"}]},
 1093:          {run, ["abc", {x,y}, [bad_option]],[{2,".*"},{3,".*"}]},
 1094:          {run, ["abc", BadRegexp, 9999],[{2,BadErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1095:          {run, ["abc", InvalidRegexp, 9999],[{2,InvalidErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1096: 
 1097:          {split, ["abc", BadRegexp],[{2,BadErr}]},
 1098:          {split, ["abc", InvalidRegexp],[{2,InvalidErr}]},
 1099:          {split, [{a,b}, ".*"]},
 1100: 
 1101:          {split, ["abc", BadRegexp, [a|b]],[{2,BadErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1102:          {split, ["abc", InvalidRegexp, [a|b]],[{2,InvalidErr},{3,".*"}]},
 1103:          {split, [{a,b}, ".*", [bad_option]]},
 1104: 
 1105:          {ucompile, 2},                         %Internal.
 1106:          {urun, 3}                              %Internal.
 1107:         ],
 1108:     error_info_lib:test_error_info(re, L).
